sentences.sContent: Like I said, perfect, if you live in Alaska.
sentences.sCn: 像我说过的，完美，如果你住在阿拉斯加的话。

sentences.sContent: Alaska and Hawaii were dependencies of the United States.
sentences.sCn: 阿拉斯加和夏威夷过去是美国的属地。

sentences.sContent: Once they went camping with friends who had moved to Alaska.
sentences.sCn: 有一次，他们和几个搬到阿拉斯加的朋友去野营。

phrases.pCn: 阿拉斯加山脉（美国阿拉斯加州南部山脉）
